scripts.wip: git submodule foreach "git commit -a -m 'chore: wip' || echo 'Commit failed in $name, continuing...'"
scripts.pull: git submodule foreach 'git pull origin main -q'
scripts.push: git submodule foreach 'git push origin main -q'
scripts.status: git submodule foreach 'git status -s || git status'
scripts.clear: git submodule foreach 'git branch | grep -v -E "main" | xargs git branch -D'
scripts.main: npm run branch && git submodule foreach git checkout main
scripts.sync: npm run pull && git commit -a -m "chore: sync each module" && git push
scripts.build: cd examples/home && npm i && npm run build
scripts.serve: cd examples/home && npm i && npm run serve
scripts.start: cd examples/home && npm i && npm run start
